name: Nabhi: The Legacy of Ed
description:
Get ready for an exciting adventure in a post-apocalyptic sci-fi world! In "Nabhi: The Legacy of Ed". You will assume the role of Ed, a young adventurer who seeks to discover the secrets of the balance between body, mind and spirit. in a devastated world You must overcome challenges, solve puzzles, and face dangerous enemies while uncovering hidden truths. Uncover Ed's legacy in a thrilling adventure packed with action, intrigue, and mystery.  Nabhi is currently under continuous development and updating, enjoy this first access. so your feedback is important to us. Join our social networks and leave us recommendations that can influence to improve the shape of the game, you can get access to development updates and more! Currently available for PC FEATURES

Game style: Platform and action elements with Metroidvania.

Chakra System: Explore and unlock all 7 chakras to increase your abilities and unravel the mystery behind the apocalypse.

Stunning Graphics and Post-apocalyptic Setting: Enjoy a visually stunning world and an exciting and intriguing plot.

Mystery Puzzles and Challenges: Overcome obstacles and solve puzzles to progress through the story and uncover the secrets of Ed and his legacy.

Mac OS and LINUX

We are working on builds for MacOS and Linux. We really want people on these platforms to try our game. Coming  soon.

CONTROLS 
  • Move: AD 
  • Target: W.S. 
  • Down: Spacebar+S 
  • Run: Shift
  • Jump: Spacebar 
  • Double Jump: space bar x2 
  • Weapon: Mouse Button 
  • Gravity: Spacebar x3 and hold 
  • Gamepad controllers are partially supported
